actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of naphthas, gas, oils, and other products from the Mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 5).

summary.text: Disapproves energy action numbered five, exempting naphthas and gas oils from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of naphthas, gas, oils, and other products from the Mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 5).
